Package com.extjs.gxt.ui.client

This package contains GXT core classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PartProvider Interface for objects that can return new object instances based on a part id.
 

Class Summary
GXT GXT core utilities and functions.
PartFactory Factory implementation that can be used to create object instances given a string identifier.
Registry A local storage of objects stored by id.
Style Defines GXT public constants and enumerations.
Version Contains the current codes release information.
 

Enum Summary
Style.AnchorPosition Anchor enumeration.
Style.AutoSizeMode Autosize enumeration.
Style.ButtonArrowAlign ButtonArrowAlign enum.
Style.ButtonScale ButtonScale enum.
Style.Direction  
Style.HideMode HideMode enum.
Style.HorizontalAlignment Horizontal alignment enumeration.
Style.IconAlign ButtonIconAlign enum.
Style.LayoutRegion Layout out regions.
Style.Orientation Orientation enum.
Style.Scroll Scroll enumeration.
Style.ScrollDir Scroll direction enum.
Style.SelectionMode Selection mode enum.
Style.SortDir Sort direction enum.
Style.VerticalAlignment Vertical alignment enumerations.
